body:
Tony: Peter, what's wrong? Why are you crying?
Peter: *crying*
Tony: Oh. Was there another dog commercial on the tv?
Peter: *nods*
Tony: Come on, let's go to the shelter. Again.

summary:
guys... Guys... GUYS WE NEED TO TALK ABOUT THIS
This is from Lexi's (Morgan's actor) Instagram. The Ironfam stuff aside, she is...
body:
guys… Guys… GUYS WE NEED TO TALK ABOUT THIS

This is from Lexi’s (Morgan’s actor) Instagram. The Ironfam stuff aside, she is going to be at the Spider-Man premiere! I know Marvel often times invites people who have been in previous movies to premieres of movies they aren’t in,,, but what if??? She is in it??? Hence the calling him brother??? Like they didn’t especially build that relationship in Endgame… what if??? GUYS WHAT IF???

blog.description: Kayla. 30. Fan of many things.

summary: Ironstrange Questions #30 - “How do you stop being scared?”
title: Ironstrange Questions #30 - “How do you stop being scared?”
body:
going from weird experimental angst to fluffy slice-of-life.

“How do you stop being scared?” Savannah asks Peter.

The two are sitting outside of the house on a hot summer day, both eating popsicles. Savannah, whose face is bright red with cherry juice, is talking about a summer day camp trip she’s scared to take, but Peter sees the deeper meaning.

“Well…” he says. “I don’t think you have to stop.”

His sister frowns as though he said something wrong. She looks downright scandalized. “I don’t like being scared,” she says. “It feels…icky.”

Peter laughs at her words. “Oh yep, it definitely feels icky,” he agrees. “The icky ends up being worth it in the end though, cause after you face your fears it feels awesome.”

“Daddy says it will be fun,” she says, taking a long lick of her popsicle.

“It will be,” he promises. “You’ll get to see all kinds of stuff at the museum.”

“I love you Peter.”

“I love you too kiddo,” he says. “Now I’m gonna get some wipes.”

Entering the house, Peter finds the box of wet wipes and pulls it out, before discarding his own popsicle stick. “I got a cherry flavored monster out there,” he chuckles, looking at Tony who is making coffee.

“I know, I eavesdropped,” Tony admits. “Front window. Good job, Pete. Really good job.”

The two are sitting outside of the house on a hot summer day, both eating popsicles. Savannah, whose face is bright red with cherry juice, is talking about a summer day camp trip she’s scared to take, but Peter sees the deeper meaning.

“Well…” he says. “I don’t think you have to stop.”

His sister frowns as though he said something wrong. She looks downright scandalized. “I don’t like being scared,” she says. “It feels…icky.”

Peter laughs at her words. “Oh yep, it definitely feels icky,” he agrees. “The icky ends up being worth it in the end though, cause after you face your fears it feels awesome.”

“Daddy says it will be fun,” she says, taking a long lick of her popsicle.

“It will be,” he promises. “You’ll get to see all kinds of stuff at the museum.”

“I love you Peter.”

“I love you too kiddo,” he says. “Now I’m gonna get some wipes.”

summary: The Darkness In Me: Superior!Tony x Peter x Tony
title: The Darkness In Me: Superior!Tony x Peter x Tony
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2FdBN4F

by SubverbalDreams

Superior Iron Man has crossed the barrier between worlds. He immediately seeks out his shadow-self to usurp his rightful place and become ruler of this new universe.

He’ll start with the innocent-eyed pretty boy whose number is first on Tony’s speed dial.

Based on a prompt by @reniisbooks on tumblr.

Everyone is over 18 in this story.

Words: 5929, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

summary: You're the One I Never Knew I Wanted
title: You're the One I Never Knew I Wanted
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WKeZzq

by fandomgirlforeva

Steve still has no idea to cope with coming back into life 70 years too late. SHIELD wants him as some sort of mega-weapon, the military wants him to be a super soldier again, and the public wants him to be this legendary hero that will save them from every known strife that has happened since he left. It’s so overwhelming, he just wants to go back to 1945 where he was in love with Peggy. But now, he can’t. Now that she’s moved on, he had to come to terms with his troubling sexuality alone. At least that’s what he thought, until a Welcome Back Party, is thrown in his honor by one man that was still around back in 1945.
Tony Stark has emotional baggage that could weigh down a private jet. His father is horrible to him, his inventions are used from his father’s gain, and his own best friend doesn’t even know all of this is going on. Sometimes he just wants to end it all, instead of being the playboy billionaire his father wants him to be in public. At least all the booze and the sex allows him to get away for a while, even if he can’t be with the one gender he’s actually attracted to. But when he meets a certain blonde haired blue eyes Golden Boy, things might get interesting.

Words: 951, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Nick Fury, Maria Hill, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Jarvis (Iron Man movies), Howard Stark, Thor (Marvel), T'Challa (Marvel), Shuri (Marvel), Peter Parker, SHIELD Agents & Staff, Carol Danvers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Sam Wilson (Marvel), James “Rhodey” Rhodes
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Implied Past Natasha Romanov/Clint Barton, I don’t know I might put in more later

by fandomgirlforeva

Steve still has no idea to cope with coming back into life 70 years too late. SHIELD wants him as some sort of mega-weapon, the military wants him to be a super soldier again, and the public wants him to be this legendary hero that will save them from every known strife that has happened since he left. It’s so overwhelming, he just wants to go back to 1945 where he was in love with Peggy. But now, he can’t. Now that she’s moved on, he had to come to terms with his troubling sexuality alone. At least that’s what he thought, until a Welcome Back Party, is thrown in his honor by one man that was still around back in 1945.
Tony Stark has emotional baggage that could weigh down a private jet. His father is horrible to him, his inventions are used from his father’s gain, and his own best friend doesn’t even know all of this is going on. Sometimes he just wants to end it all, instead of being the playboy billionaire his father wants him to be in public. At least all the booze and the sex allows him to get away for a while, even if he can’t be with the one gender he’s actually attracted to. But when he meets a certain blonde haired blue eyes Golden Boy, things might get interesting.

Welcome to the family.

blog.name: ask-starker
blog.title:
Ask Mr. and Mr. Stark
everybody is 20+
blog.description:
bold text: Tony

Italics: Peter

Main: @twink-Peter

Ask anything you want about mine and Peter’s relationship

summary: How do you usually spend the weekends now that you have Morgan?
question: How do you usually spend the weekends now that you have Morgan?
answer: Well usually our weekend starts woth Morgan jumping on our bed to wake us up, but now she has our puppy Spleen come in and lock our faces. She watches cartoons while we attempt to make breakfast then we hang out as a family either we go somewhere or watch a movie. And if we can we try to go on a date night with or without Morgan

blog.name: ao3feed-peterparker
blog.title: AO3Feed: Peter Parker
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive of Our Own under the tag Peter Parker. The stories are automatically posted here from the RSS feed.

summary: I keep running for a soft place to fall
title: I keep running for a soft place to fall
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2KmWEXm

by klassmartin

“I failed to protect him. I fail all the time. What is the point in me being… this… When all I do is get the people I love hurt… Killed?” He meets her gaze once more, voice coated in despair. “Everyone I care about gets hurt, MJ. First my parents, then Uncle Ben, Mr Stark… Now Ned.”

Words: 3781, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Michelle Jones, Ned Leeds, May Parker (Spider-Man)
  • Relationships: Michelle Jones/Peter Parker
  • Additional Tags: Angst with a Happy Ending, an attempt at exploring Peter’s abandonment issues, Ned gets hurt but it’s all good, Mention of Character Death, Post-Avengers: Endgame (Movie)
